name: Talk Vincent and Luther
_source: s;Vincent;Luther, have you been here before?
s;Luther;It was a long time ago.
s;Luther;Lord Simon's father was much closer to Lord Morrissey.
s;Luther;I accompanied him as a general when Lord Morrissey would invite allies for festivities.
s;Simon;If I can be honest, I'm just not sure if he'll listen.
s;Simon;I've really neglected our relationship with House Morrissey...
s;Simon;All my father built up...{w} I let it crumble.
s;Luther;We've had our own concerns since your father's time.
s;Luther;With the world in such a state, we've needed to protect ourselves first.
s;Luther;You just need to speak with him.
s;Vincent;I can't say I know anything about diplomacy and all that, but I trust you, Simon.
s;Vincent;I'm sure if you tell him about what happened, he'll help us.
